overview: Scott Bischoff oversees corporate operations for Splice. His responsibilities include but are not limited to; human resource policies and procedures, accounts receivable and payable, all financials and P&L accountability. His contributions at Splice have ensured the company remains solid and secure enjoying an outstanding financial reputation in the industry. Scott has over 15 years of experience in operations and financial management . His experience spans multiple industries including corporate retail, software/technology and corporate franchise. For seven years he was the District Manager of Operations/Finance for DHE Inc, a leader in the tourist retail market with operations across the U.S. and overseas. Scott has also held management positions at CrossCommerce and Fortune 100 companies including Southland Corporation and ServiceMaster Corporation. He has personally managed annual revenue in excess of $50 million while surpassing strict net income objectives. Scott holds a BA degree in Communications from California State University at Chico, and is completing his MBA at Saint Maryâ€™s College of California.

relationships.title: Director of Finance and Corporate Operations
